item.title: About
item.description:
I’m a British-Bulgarian, Senior Environment Artist, currently working at Rebellion, Liverpool.

Released game titles:

Sniper Elite: Resistance (PC, Xbox, PS5) - 30 Jan 2025
Sniper Elite 5 (PC, Xbox, PS5) - 26 May 2022
Hyperbrawl Tournament (PC, Xbox, PS4, Switch) - 20 Oct 2020

I graduated high school with a Computer Science degree in Bulgaria, whilst also doing freelance 2D art. In 2016 I moved to the UK and finished a BA (Hons) in Games Design at University of Central Lancashire, Preston (UCLan). In 2019 I completed my studies with a First Class Degree and won the Games Design Student of the Year Award. I also took part in The Rookies 2019 and was picked as one of “Rookie of the Year - Finalist”. Later that year and after sending out many job applications I entered the games industry with my first job as a 3D Artist.

I often set out on long journeys of creating real time 3D environments. Why do I say long? With all the different fields one needs to combine towards the making of a good scene it can sometimes take weeks and months to complete.

That arduous journey is where the enjoyment comes. The process teaches you more about art and the 3D field. It also teaches you about yourself and your perception of the world outside of the camera frustum and the pixel-grid perfect screen you see on the monitor during the everyday.

I‚Äôm here to write and share this journey, including all the little tips and tricks I discover and learn along the way. And in doing so will be sharing my creative process, the sources of my inspirations and my ambitions with each scene.

I hope you find enjoyment in this and get insight into what might be new for you in creating the best 3D worlds, games, and art you dare to boldly dream of.
